## About Me

Alex Dian tries his best at exploring a variety of topics. You can never really pinpoint what he is doing at any one time -- maybe there should be a Dian's Uncertainty Principle. The highest probability measurement outcomes are: basketball, physics, machine learning, Japanese culture, and history/art.
